DESCRIPTION: Execute the action to random enemies X times.
Some cards require a certain amount of Charge to activate.
Cards with the 'Follow Up' effect will be played automatically with no cost when certain conditions are met (random target).
Includes Bleeding, Burn, Shock, and Wind Shear. Benefits from pstack effects.
Damage actions that reduce toughness from >0 to <=0 are considered Break.
Elemental damage would reduce target's toughness. The reduction amount would be the number in the parenthesis.
A state applied when toughness is reduced to 0 or below.
At the start of the turn, if the enemy is a normal/elite/BOSS and has at least 1/2/3 stacks of Freeze, all stacks are removed and the turn is skipped. After receiving damage, 1 stack is removed.
DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take physical damage (1) equal to 5% of max HP (up to 10), 1 stack is removed.
DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take 6 fire damage (1), 1 stack is removed.
DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take 7 lightning damage (1), 1 stack is removed.
DoT. Trigger at the start of the turn: take wind damage (1) equal to 2X (up to 5 stacks), 1 stack is removed.
Damage dealt is reduced by 33%, and 1 stack is removed at the end of the turn.
Adds 1 stack when taking damage, up to 5 stacks. At the start of the turn, remove all stacks and take 2 damage for each removed stack.
Break damage is increased by X. DoT damage to Broken enemies is increased by X.
Toughness shred value of elemental damage is increased by 50X%. 1 stack is removed at the end of the turn.
Enhanced by 'Break Effect,' unaffected by 'Strength'.
After dealing damage via Follow Up card, deal X damage to the target and apply 1 stack.
Increases DoT taken by X%. Stacks up to 99.
Up to 6 stacks. At the start of the turn, 1 stack is removed. NL Explode when targeted by an attack card: remove all stacks, take X*X wind damage (1).
Crit rate is increased by 10X% (Crit DMG is 100%). NL After taking normal damage, all stacks are removed.
After using Charge, remove 1 stack and recover an equal amount of Charge.
After dealing damage to the target, gain X blocks.

At the end of the turn, if amount >=9, lose 9 amount and bounce 3 times: deal 5 lightning damage (1) to random enemies; finally, deal 5+X lightning damage (1) to all enemies (X equals the number of its debuffs).
When amount >=7, lose 7 amount to deal 1-7 Imaginary damage to a random enemy and gain 1-7 Block.
Upon receiving attack damage, gains X Block. Block gain increases as is triggered. Resets to X at the start of your turn.
Whenever you play a card, gain X Block.
At the end of your turn, gain X Block. Receiving unblocked attack damage reduces Plated Armor by 1.
